tool_description: Generates standardized DICOM metadata headers for medical images including patient information, study details, and technical parameters.

modality.description: Imaging modality: CT, MR, XR, US, NM, RF

study_description.description: Description of the study being performed

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid study ID: Study ID must be a unique non-empty string.
Invalid series ID: Series ID must be a unique non-empty string.
Unsupported modality: Use one of [CT, MR, XR, US, NM, RF].
Invalid body part: Body part must be a valid anatomical designation.
Missing study description: Study description is required and cannot be empty.
DICOM standard violation: Generated metadata does not conform to DICOM standards.
usage: Provide patient_id, study_id, series_id, modality, body_part, and study_description. Optionally include institution_name, referring_physician, and contrast_agent for complete metadata.

dicom_header_generated.description: Whether DICOM header was successfully generated

standard_compliance.description: Whether the metadata complies with DICOM standards
